verses.text_plain: Now after this it came to pass, that David smote the Philistines, and subdued them, and took Gath and her towns out of the hand of the Philistines.
verses.verse_html: 1Now after this it came to pass, that David smote the Philistines, and subdued them, and took Gath and her towns out of the hand of the Philistines.

tokens.text: it came to pass, that David

verses.text_plain: And he smote Moab; and the Moabites became David’s servants, and brought gifts.
verses.verse_html: 2And he smote Moab; and the Moabites became David’s servants, and brought gifts.

verses.text_plain: And David smote Hadarezer king of Zobah unto Hamath, as he went to stablish his dominion by the river Euphrates.
verses.verse_html:
3And David smote Hadarezer king of Zobah unto Hamath, as he went to stablish his dominion by the river Euphrates. ▼
▼ Hadarezer: or, Hadadezer

verses.text_plain: And David took from him a thousand chariots, and seven thousand horsemen, and twenty thousand footmen: David also houghed all the chariot horses, but reserved of them an hundred chariots.
verses.verse_html:
4And David took from him a thousand chariots, and seven thousand horsemen, and twenty thousand footmen: David also houghed all the chariot horses, but reserved of them an hundred chariots. ▼
▼ seven…: or, seven hundred

footnotes.body_html: ▼ seven…: or, seven hundred

verses.text_plain: And when the Syrians of Damascus came to help Hadarezer king of Zobah, David slew of the Syrians two and twenty thousand men.
verses.verse_html:
5And when the Syrians of Damascus came to help Hadarezer king of Zobah, David slew of the Syrians two and twenty thousand men. ▼
▼ Damascus: Heb. Darmesek

verses.text_plain: Then David put garrisons in Syria–damascus; and the Syrians became David’s servants, and brought gifts. Thus the Lord preserved David whithersoever he went.
verses.verse_html: 6Then David put garrisons in Syria–damascus; and the Syrians became David’s servants, and brought gifts. Thus the Lord preserved David whithersoever he went.

verses.text_plain: And David took the shields of gold that were on the servants of Hadarezer, and brought them to Jerusalem.
verses.verse_html: 7And David took the shields of gold that were on the servants of Hadarezer, and brought them to Jerusalem.

verses.text_plain: Likewise from Tibhath, and from Chun, cities of Hadarezer, brought David very much brass, wherewith Solomon made the brasen sea, and the pillars, and the vessels of brass.
verses.verse_html:
8Likewise from Tibhath, and from Chun, cities of Hadarezer, brought David very much brass, wherewith Solomon made the brasen sea, and the pillars, and the vessels of brass. ▼
▼ Tibhath…: called in the book of Samuel Betah, and Berothai

footnotes.body_text: ▼ Tibhath…: called in the book of Samuel Betah, and Berothai
footnotes.body_html: ▼ Tibhath…: called in the book of Samuel Betah, and Berothai

verses.text_plain: Now when Tou king of Hamath heard how David had smitten all the host of Hadarezer king of Zobah;
verses.verse_html:
9Now when Tou king of Hamath heard how David had smitten all the host of Hadarezer king of Zobah; ▼
▼ Tou: also called, Toi

footnotes.body_html: ▼ Tou: also called, Toi

verses.text_plain: He sent Hadoram his son to king David, to enquire of his welfare, and to congratulate him, because he had fought against Hadarezer, and smitten him; (for Hadarezer had war with Tou;) and with him all manner of vessels of gold and silver and brass.
verses.verse_html:
10He sent Hadoram his son to king David, to enquire of his welfare, and to congratulate him, because he had fought against Hadarezer, and smitten him; (for Hadarezer had war with Tou;) and with him all manner of vessels of gold and silver and brass. ▼
▼ Hadoram: also called, Joram
 , ▼
▼ to enquire…: or, to salute
 , ▼
▼ to congratulate: Heb. to bless
 , ▼
▼ had war: Heb. was the man of wars

footnotes.body_html: ▼ Hadoram: also called, Joram
▼ to enquire…: or, to salute
▼ to congratulate: Heb. to bless

footnotes.body_text: ▼ had war: Heb. was the man of wars
footnotes.body_html: ▼ had war: Heb. was the man of wars

verses.text_plain: Them also king David dedicated unto the Lord, with the silver and the gold that he brought from all these nations; from Edom, and from Moab, and from the children of Ammon, and from the Philistines, and from Amalek.
verses.verse_html: 11Them also king David dedicated unto the Lord, with the silver and the gold that he brought from all these nations; from Edom, and from Moab, and from the children of Ammon, and from the Philistines, and from Amalek.

verses.text_plain: Moreover Abishai the son of Zeruiah slew of the Edomites in the valley of salt eighteen thousand.
verses.verse_html:
12Moreover Abishai the son of Zeruiah slew of the Edomites in the valley of salt eighteen thousand. ▼
▼ Abishai: Heb. Abshai

verses.text_plain: And he put garrisons in Edom; and all the Edomites became David’s servants. Thus the Lord preserved David whithersoever he went.
verses.verse_html: 13And he put garrisons in Edom; and all the Edomites became David’s servants. Thus the Lord preserved David whithersoever he went.

verses.text_plain: So David reigned over all Israel, and executed judgment and justice among all his people.
verses.verse_html: 14So David reigned over all Israel, and executed judgment and justice among all his people.

verses.text_plain: And Joab the son of Zeruiah was over the host; and Jehoshaphat the son of Ahilud, recorder.
verses.verse_html:
15And Joab the son of Zeruiah was over the host; and Jehoshaphat the son of Ahilud, recorder. ▼
▼ recorder: or, remembrancer

verses.text_plain: And Zadok the son of Ahitub, and Abimelech the son of Abiathar, were the priests; and Shavsha was scribe;
verses.verse_html:
16And Zadok the son of Ahitub, and Abimelech the son of Abiathar, were the priests; and Shavsha was scribe; ▼
▼ Abimelech: also called, Ahimelech
 , ▼
▼ Shavsha: also called Seraiah or Shisha

footnotes.body_html: ▼ Abimelech: also called, Ahimelech

footnotes.body_text: ▼ Shavsha: also called Seraiah or Shisha
footnotes.body_html: ▼ Shavsha: also called Seraiah or Shisha

verses.text_plain: And Benaiah the son of Jehoiada was over the Cherethites and the Pelethites; and the sons of David were chief about the king.
verses.verse_html:
17And Benaiah the son of Jehoiada was over the Cherethites and the Pelethites; and the sons of David were chief about the king. ▼
▼ about…: Heb. at the hand of the king

footnotes.body_text: ▼ about…: Heb. at the hand of the king
footnotes.body_html: ▼ about…: Heb. at the hand of the king
